About

Sils im Engandin, Switzerland, near St. Moritz, a high altitude training paradise.

Originally from México, a first generation college student, I obtained my Ph.D. from the Department of Political Science at the University of Notre Dame in 2011. Outside academia, running is my biggest passion. I have competed in some of the most iconic marathons in the world including the BMW Berlin Marathon, the TCS New York City Marathon, the Bank of America Chicago Marathon, and the Boston Marathon. 30+ full marathons later, I am still running strong.

  • Sergio Béjar-López
